data.comment: Kick-off has been delayed.
The match has started.
In the minute 1, New York awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for New England at Gillette Stadium.
New York are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 4, Tom Barlow gets his shot on target but fails to score for New York.
In Foxborough New York attack through Tom Barlow. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a New England goal kick.
In the minute 5, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Jair Marrufo awards the home team a throw-in.
Jair Marrufo awards New England a goal kick.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for New York in the half of New England.
Jair Marrufo signals a New England throw-in in New York's half.
Throw-in New York.
In the minute 8, New York awarded a free kick in their own half.
New York to take a throw-in in New England territory.
In Foxborough a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 9, Throw-in for New York in their own half.
Goal kick for New York at Gillette Stadium.
Ball safe as New England is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 11, Can New York get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New England's half?
New York have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Can New England get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York's half?
In the minute 13, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Foxborough.
Free kick for New England in the half of New York.
In the minute 15, Jair Marrufo awards the away team a throw-in.
New England to take a throw-in in New York territory.
Free kick for New York in their own half.
In the minute 17, New York drives forward and Tom Barlow gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Jair Marrufo signals a throw-in for New York, close to New England's area.
Ball safe as New England is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 21, New England awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for New England at Gillette Stadium.
Throw-in New England.
In the minute 23, Can New England capitalize from this throw-in deep inside New York's half?
New York have a goal kick.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to New England in their own half.
In the minute 26, New England have a dangerous throw-in.
New York needs to be cautious. New England have an attacking throw-in.
Gustavo Bou (New England) strikes at Gillette Stadium but his header is cleared.
In the minute 28, Gustavo Bou for the home team is judged to be offside.
New York attack but Ben Mines's header doesn't find the target.
New England have a goal kick.
In the minute 31, Throw-in for New York in their own half.
Throw-in for New York in the half of New England.
Free kick New York.
In the minute 32, Throw-in high up the field for New York in Foxborough.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Foxborough.
Jair Marrufo awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 34, Jair Marrufo signals a New England throw-in in New York's half.
New England drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Throw-in for New York close to the penalty box.
In the minute 35, Goal! New York have got their heads in front thanks to a Omir Fernandez strike.
Great play from Ben Mines to set up the goal.
Can New England get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York's half?
In the minute 38, Jair Marrufo awards New York a goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for New England in their own half.
In the minute 40, New England are caught offside.
Ball goes out of play for a New England goal kick.
New England needs to be cautious. New York have an attacking throw-in.
Goal kick for New England at Gillette Stadium.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Gustavo Bou.
In the minute 41, That's a fine assist from Teal Bunbury.
In the minute 43, Throw-in for New England at Gillette Stadium.
Ball safe as New England is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for New York in the half of New England.
In the minute 45, Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to New York.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
New England to take a throw-in in New York territory.
In the minute 45, Throw-in New York.
Jair Marrufo blows to end the first-half.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Goal kick for New England at Gillette Stadium.
Jair Marrufo signals a New York throw-in in New England's half.
Throw-in for New England in the half of New York.
In the minute 48, New England's Teal Bunbury breaks free at Gillette Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Jair Marrufo awards New York a goal kick.
New England awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 50, In Foxborough New England drive forward through Adam Buksa. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for New York close to the penalty box.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to New York.
In the minute 52, New England have a goal kick.
Jair Marrufo signals a throw-in for New York, close to New England's area.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for New York close to the penalty box.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for New England at Gillette Stadium.
Throw-in high up the field for New England in Foxborough.
Free kick for New England in the half of New York.
In the minute 57, Ball goes out of play for a New York goal kick.
New York have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for New England in their own half.
In the minute 60, Corner awarded to New York.
Corner awarded to New York.
At Gillette Stadium, New England are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 61, Jair Marrufo awards the home team a throw-in.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to New York in their own half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 64, Free kick New York.
New England have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Gustavo Bou hits the post! Very nearly a goal there in Foxborough for New England.
In the minute 66, It's a goal kick for the away team in Foxborough.
Can New England capitalize from this throw-in deep inside New York's half?
Chris Armas (New York) is making a first substitution, with Marc Rzatkowski replacing Florian Valot.
In the minute 68, Mathias Jorgensen is replacing Tom Barlow for New York at Gillette Stadium.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Kaku.
The away team have replaced Patrick Seagrist with Kyle Duncan. This is the third substitution made today by Chris Armas.
In the minute 72, New York have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Kelyn Rowe is on a sub for Matt Polster for New England.
Bruce Arena is making the team's first substitution at Gillette Stadium with Tommy McNamara replacing Adam Buksa.
In the minute 74, Kaku is back on his feet again.
Corner awarded to New York.
In the minute 75, It's a goal kick for the home team in Foxborough.
New York make their fourth substitution with Aaron Long replacing Ben Mines.
In Foxborough a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in New York.
In the minute 79, New York awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to New England.
New York have a goal kick.
In the minute 80, Chris Armas is making the team's fifth substitution at Gillette Stadium with Jared Stroud replacing Mandela Egbo.
Can New York get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New England's half?
Ball safe as New England is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 82, New England have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Cristian Penilla of New England gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a New York goal kick.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for New England in their own half.
DeJuan Jones is replacing Alex Buttner for the home team.
New York awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 86, New York awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jair Marrufo signals a New York throw-in in New England's half.
New York have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
In the minute 88, Corner awarded to New York.
Jair Marrufo awards the home team a throw-in.
Bruce Arena (New England) is making a fourth substitution, with Tajon Buchanan replacing Diego Fagundez.
In the minute 89, Goal kick for New York at Gillette Stadium.
New York needs to be cautious. New England have an attacking throw-in.
At Gillette Stadium the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
New England's Kelyn Rowe is on target but unsuccessful.
Ball safe as New England is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Jair Marrufo signals a free kick to New England in their own half.
In Foxborough, Teal Bunbury of New England is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to New England.
New England have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
Throw-in for New England close to the penalty box.
New England have been awarded a corner by Jair Marrufo.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-1.
Tim Parker (New York) sees red and is sent off in Foxborough!
